ModMetaData.name: Change map edge limit de-hugged
ModMetaData.author: Safairette
ModMetaData.description: Simple mod that allows you to customize "too close to map edge" limits when placing buildings, blueprints or zones. Should works with any other mod (unless is doing the same thing). Updated to no longer require HugsLib Dependencies This mod depends on Harmony. Load Harmony before this mod.
